caring.translation[0].definitions[0].def: thinking about what other people need or want and trying to help them
caring.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The school aims to provide a caring environment.
caring.translation[0].definitions[1].def: involving the job of looking after other people
caring.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Many of the caring professions are badly paid.
More men are taking on a caring role.
